title: With a New Nigeria Refinery, Africa’s Richest Man Wants ‘to Rescue the Country’
desc: Aliko Dangote, Africa’s richest man, has an ambitious vision for the continent’s most populous nation, but hurdles stand in his way.

title: Canada Goose's Snow Goose Celebrates National Polar Bear Day With Capsule
desc: The outerwear brand is celebrating National Polar Bear Day and its partnership with the Polar Bears International organization with a capsule.

title: The printer is here to tell you you’ve failed at life. Don’t let it
desc: In the community WhatsApp group I’m a member of, stories abound of people trying to help their parents set up printers over the phone

title: Why the Clintons’ ordeal might end up backfiring on Trump
desc: When former President Bill Clinton testifies to a congressional committee Friday on the Jeffrey Epstein scandal, he will be setting a precedent that President Donald Trump may come to regret.

title: Major music festival cancelled 24 hours out from first show
desc: Rolling Loud Australia, the local iteration of “the world’s biggest hip-hop festival”, has pulled the pin less than a day before its first event.

title: Trump’s Foreign Policy: Resurrecting Empire
desc: President Trump’s approach is a revival of the mission of empire — acquiring the territories and resources of sovereign peoples.

title: Power failure could undermine America’s AI ambitions
desc: Spiralling electricity demand threatens to hold the US back in its technological race with China

title: Family pays tribute to ‘inspiring’ restaurant manager at Fish at 55 in Rochester High Street
desc: The brother of a popular restaurant manager has paid a heartfelt tribute to his “inspiring“ younger sister who he says was “chasing her dreams”.

title: Lakers suffer another heartbreaking loss in Phoenix
desc: Royce O’Neale’s game-winner 3-pointer with 0.9 seconds left and Austin Reaves’ wide-open missed corner 3 at the buzzer sent the Lakers out of Mortgage Matchup Center with a 113-110 defeat for their third straight loss.

title: Mark your calendar for SM Supermalls’ 6th Annual International Women’s Day Summit
desc: SM Supermalls will celebrate its 6th annual International Women’s Day Summit, “The Future is Hers. Create. Lead. Thrive.”
